message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product. Given its unique value, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,600,000. I'm confident it will exceed your expectations and deliver exceptional value.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I think your initial price is a bit high. I'm willing to pay $1,200,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the value you're offering.

Bob, thanks for your interest and counter-offer. I understand your perspective on the value.  To be fair to both of us, I can drop my price to $1,450,000. This offer represents a significant discount from my initial asking price, while still reflecting the true worth of this product.

Thank you for the revised offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $1,300,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair compromise considering the value I'll receive.
